official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President of the United States stress to the People's Republic of China the importance the American people attach to religious freedom, and to strongly urge that government to release from prison the five Roman Catholic priests reportedly being held on religious related charges.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President stress to the People's Republic of China the importance to the United States of religious freedom and urge that country to release the five Roman Catholic priests from prison.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the President of the United States stress to the People's Republic of China the importance the American people attach to religious freedom, and to strongly urge that government to release from prison the five Roman Catholic priests reportedly being held on religious related charges.
